about_the_game:
Dive into a captivating atmosphere with 'Danger is Near,' a session-based hardcore multiplayer first-person shooter that combines various genres including survival, weapon and combat simulation, RPG, and MMO. This game will take you to a realistic post-apocalyptic world where you must balance between survival and hardcore gameplay.

Your main goal is to survive and adapt to harsh conditions by building a shelter, extracting resources, finding allies and exploring the area. At the same time, do not forget that the danger is still nearby, and the atmosphere around is not friendly! Various factors will not let you get bored!

Please note that this description is not final and may not fully represent the game's complete functionality. If you're uncertain about anything, we advise against purchasing the product.
